languages.text: "После того, как Тервантьяс поссорился с ведьмами и лишился протекции кабала, его убежища в Комморре превратились в смертельную западню — полагаю, они уже разграблены и разрушены. Возможно, где-то в переплетениях Паутины... или в реальном мире. Хотя последнее — безумие даже для гемункула".

"After Tervantias quarrelled with the Wyches and was stripped of the Kabal's protection, his havens in Commorragh were turned into a deadly trap — I imagine they have been ransacked and destroyed by now. His other hideouts may be somewhere in the tangle of the Webway... or in realspace. But that last possibility is madness, even for a Haemonculus."
languages.original_text: "После того, как Тервантьяс поссорился с ведьмами и лишился протекции кабала, его убежища в Комморре превратились в смертельную западню — полагаю, они уже разграблены и разрушены. Возможно, где-то в переплетениях Паутины... или в реальном мире. Хотя последнее — безумие даже для гемункула".

traits.locale_text: "After Tervantias quarrelled with the Wyches and was stripped of the Kabal's protection, his havens in Commorragh were turned into a deadly trap — I imagine that they have been ransacked and destroyed by now. His other hideouts may be somewhere in the tangle of the Webway... or in realspace. But that last possibility is madness, even for a Haemonculus."

His other hideouts may be somewhere in the tangle of the Webway... or in realspace. But that last possibility is madness, even for a Haemonculus."

"After Tervantias quarrelled with the Wyches and was stripped of the Kabal's protection, his havens in Commorragh were turned into a deadly trap — I imagine that they have been ransacked and destroyed by now. His other hideouts may be somewhere in the tangle of the Webway... or in realspace. But that last possibility is madness, even for a Haemonculus."

"After Tervantias quarrelled with the Wyches and was stripped of the Kabal's protection, his havens in Commorragh were turned into a deadly trap — I imagine that they have been ransacked and destroyed by now. His other hideouts may be somewhere in the tangle of the Webway... or in realspace. But that last possibility is madness, even for a Haemonculus."

languages.text: «Después de que Tervantias se enfrentara a las Brujas y perdiera la protección de la Kábala, sus guaridas en Commorragh se convirtieron en una trampa mortal. Imagino que a estas alturas ya las han saqueado y destruido. Tiene otros escondites, en distintas partes de la Telaraña... o en el espacio real. Pero esto último sería una locura hasta para un Hemónculo».
languages.original_text: "After Tervantias quarrelled with the Wyches and was stripped of the Kabal's protection, his havens in Commorragh were turned into a deadly trap — I imagine they have been ransacked and destroyed by now. His other hideouts may be somewhere in the tangle of the Webway... or in realspace. But that last possibility is madness, even for a Haemonculus."

traits.locale_text: «Después de que Tervantias se enfrentara a las Brujas y perdiera la protección de la Kábala, sus guaridas en Commorragh se convirtieron en una trampa mortal. Imagino que a estas alturas ya las han saqueado y destruido. Tiene otros escondites, en distintas partes de la Telaraña... o en el espacio real. Pero esto último sería una locura hasta para un Hemónculo».

languages.text: “特万提亚斯与那些巫灵爆发冲突之后，就失去了阴谋团的庇护，他在科摩罗的巢穴都变成了致命的陷阱。我猜，那些地方已经被疯狂破坏、洗劫一空了。其他的巢穴可能在网道的某处……也可能在真实世界里，但即便是对血伶人而言，把巢穴安置在真实世界里也实在是太疯狂了。”
languages.original_text: "After Tervantias quarrelled with the Wyches and was stripped of the Kabal's protection, his havens in Commorragh were turned into a deadly trap — I imagine they have been ransacked and destroyed by now. His other hideouts may be somewhere in the tangle of the Webway... or in realspace. But that last possibility is madness, even for a Haemonculus."

traits.locale_text: “特万提亚斯与那些巫灵爆发冲突之后，就失去了阴谋团的庇护，他在科摩罗的巢穴都变成了致命的陷阱。我猜，那些地方已经被疯狂破坏、洗劫一空了。其他的巢穴可能在网道的某处……也可能在真实世界里，但即便是对血伶人而言，把巢穴安置在真实世界里也实在是太疯狂了。”

languages.text: 「テルヴァンティアスがウィッチと喧嘩して陰謀団の保護を剥奪された後、コモラフにある隠れ家は恐ろしい罠と化したのさ。今では荒らされ破壊されていると思うがな。他の隠れ家は、網辻のどこかにあるかもしれない…それかリアルスペースに。だが、後者を選ぶのはさすがに狂ってる。たとえハモンキュラスであってもだ」
languages.original_text: "After Tervantias quarrelled with the Wyches and was stripped of the Kabal's protection, his havens in Commorragh were turned into a deadly trap — I imagine they have been ransacked and destroyed by now. His other hideouts may be somewhere in the tangle of the Webway... or in realspace. But that last possibility is madness, even for a Haemonculus."

traits.locale_text: 「テルヴァンティアスがウィッチと喧嘩して陰謀団の保護を剥奪された後、コモラフにある隠れ家は恐ろしい罠と化したのさ。今では荒らされ破壊されていると思うがな。他の隠れ家は、網辻のどこかにあるかもしれない…それかリアルスペースに。だが、後者を選ぶのはさすがに狂ってる。たとえハモンキュラスであってもだ」

languages.text: « Après sa querelle avec les Cérastes, Tervantias a perdu la protection de la Kabale et ses repaires à Commorragh sont devenus un piège mortel. À l'heure qu'il est, ils ont sans doute été pillés et détruits. Ses autres planques se trouvent probablement quelque part dans l'écheveau de la Toile... ou dans l'espace réel. Encore que cette dernière possibilité soit de la folie pure, même pour un hémoncule. »
languages.original_text: "After Tervantias quarrelled with the Wyches and was stripped of the Kabal's protection, his havens in Commorragh were turned into a deadly trap — I imagine they have been ransacked and destroyed by now. His other hideouts may be somewhere in the tangle of the Webway... or in realspace. But that last possibility is madness, even for a Haemonculus."

traits.locale_text: « Après sa querelle avec les Cérastes, Tervantias a perdu la protection de la Kabale et ses repaires à Commorragh sont devenus un piège mortel. À l'heure qu'il est, ils ont sans doute été pillés et détruits. Ses autres planques se trouvent probablement quelque part dans l'écheveau de la Toile... ou dans l'espace réel. Encore que cette dernière possibilité soit de la folie pure, même pour un hémoncule. »

languages.text: "Nachdem Tervantias mit den Hekatari gestritten hatte und ihm der Schutz der Kabale entzogen worden war, wurden seine Häfen in Commorragh in eine tödliche Falle verwandelt — ich nehme an, dass sie inzwischen geplündert und zerstört wurden. Seine anderen Verstecke liegen vielleicht irgendwo im Gewirr des Netzes der Tausend Tore ... oder im Realraum. Doch diese letzte Möglichkeit ist Wahnsinn, selbst für einen Haemonculus."
languages.original_text: "After Tervantias quarrelled with the Wyches and was stripped of the Kabal's protection, his havens in Commorragh were turned into a deadly trap — I imagine they have been ransacked and destroyed by now. His other hideouts may be somewhere in the tangle of the Webway... or in realspace. But that last possibility is madness, even for a Haemonculus."

traits.locale_text: "Nachdem Tervantias mit den Hekatari gestritten hatte und ihm der Schutz der Kabale entzogen worden war, wurden seine Häfen in Commorragh in eine tödliche Falle verwandelt — ich nehme an, dass sie inzwischen geplündert und zerstört wurden. Seine anderen Verstecke liegen vielleicht irgendwo im Gewirr des Netzes der Tausend Tore ... oder im Realraum. Doch diese letzte Möglichkeit ist Wahnsinn, selbst für einen Haemonculus."

languages.original_text: "After Tervantias quarrelled with the Wyches and was stripped of the Kabal's protection, his havens in Commorragh were turned into a deadly trap — I imagine that they have been ransacked and destroyed by now. His other hideouts may be somewhere in the tangle of the Webway... or in realspace. But that last possibility is madness, even for a Haemonculus."

languages.text: "Tervantias, Viçlerle ters düşüp Kabal'ın himayesinden mahrum kalınca Commorragh'daki tüm sığınakları birer kapana döndü. Hepsi çoktan yağmalanıp dağıtılmıştır kesin. Diğer inleriyse Ağyol'un dolambaçlı düğümlerinde... Ya da gerçekuzayda olabilir. Gerçi bu son dediğim hiç akıl kârı değil. Haimonkulus olsan bile değil."
languages.original_text: "After Tervantias quarrelled with the Wyches and was stripped of the Kabal's protection, his havens in Commorragh were turned into a deadly trap — I imagine they have been ransacked and destroyed by now. His other hideouts may be somewhere in the tangle of the Webway... or in realspace. But that last possibility is madness, even for a Haemonculus."

traits.locale_text: "Tervantias, Viçlerle ters düşüp Kabal'ın himayesinden atılınca Commorragh'daki tüm sığınakları birer kapana döndü. Hepsi çoktan yağmalanıp dağıtılmıştır. Diğer sığınaklarını Ağyol üzerinde... Ya da gerçekuzayda bir yerlere kurmuş olabilir. Gerçi bu son dediğim hiç akıl kârı değil. Haimonkulus olsan bile değil."
